name: PetSmart
description: Chain featuring a range of pets, supplies & food (most offer grooming, boarding & other services).
address: PetSmart, 1325 Main St, North Vancouver, BC V7J 1C5

featured_reviews.review_id: We just bought a Top Fin Dazzle 3 gallon tank for our betta, it was supposed to include a 12v power adapter and a filter, but they were not in the box.
featured_reviews.review_text: We just bought a Top Fin Dazzle 3 gallon tank for our betta, it was supposed to include a 12v power adapter and a filter, but they were not in the box.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Absolutely unacceptable, inhumane, and abusive treatment of their animals for sale.

Absolutely heartbreaking to see animals that were barely moving, many of which appeared very sick.

I hope they take appropriate steps to educate their staff how to properly house and maintain the animals they sell.

Not to mention that they have a very low quality selection of pet items in general, with extremely high prices. I was in a pinch to buy some items for my pet, but could not bring myself to spend a dime here in good conscience.

featured_reviews.review_id: I feel very grateful for this Petsmart location for the way they take care of their little critters. I have visited most Petsmarts in the lower mainland and I often saw little hamsters and mice running on wheels that are not only dirty but also way too small for them (it would hurt their spines). And they often lived in smelly cages (pee soaked bedding) and having only pellets (no nutrients) for food. But this Petsmart in North Vancouver provide their rodents with proper size(bigger) and clean wheels to run on, their beddings are clean, and they even give them a variety of fresh vegetables for snacks alongside pellets! I saw happy and healthy  mice exercising on the wheels and comfortably cuddling with each other today. They were so comfortable with humans(thanks to the kind people who take good care of them) they would come out and curiously sniff us. I'm so happy for the animals to be taken such good care of. Thank you guys so much NV Petsmart!

featured_reviews.review_id: We do our Yorkie grooming at PetSmart. We tried several groomers and we have settled on PetSmart for good service and value.
featured_reviews.review_text: We do our Yorkie grooming at PetSmart. We tried several groomers and we have settled on PetSmart for good service and value.

featured_reviews.review_id:
This is the location from which we adopted our beloved cat: Manitoba. The staff were very helpful throughout the adoption process, and the manager (I believe his name was Alex?) went above and beyond. He helped us fill out the paperwork, which because of his help did not feel like a hassle, and he stayed in constant contact throughout the approval and "take home" process. He also waited for us to drive back with our lease agreement documents very close to closing time on a Sunday, and for that we are very grateful. They were working with Action for Animals at the time, and their whole adoption process was very straightforward. Although the profile posted for the public did not go into depth regarding the cats' personalities, they did have folders full of information, advice and recommendations for each of the kitties.
Aside from this, we found the store to be clean and organized, but there were dogs inside barking which made the kittens quite jumpy and scared at times. Also, the cat enclosure did not have a climbing or scratching tower (which most PetSmarts do), so we believe that would be a great addition for the kitties enrichment.
featured_reviews.review_text:

Aside from this, we found the store to be clean and organized, but there were dogs inside barking which made the kittens quite jumpy and scared at times. Also, the cat enclosure did not have a climbing or scratching tower (which most PetSmarts do), so we believe that would be a great addition for the kitties enrichment.

featured_reviews.review_id: Please check the receipt to make sure the price and discount were right before leaving the store. I am an frequent customer. I have been shopping at this store for quite a long time. Last week, I found out a problem at the Main Street  store in North Vancouver. I bought over 20 feeding fishes with my wife and they were on sale. When I paid, a young cashier seems didn't know what kind of fish I bought.  So I told him they were Rosy Red Minnow which was $0.40 each. I also showed him their discount label on my phone.  The discount label said buy 5 save 25% on all fish. The cashier ignored what the label said.  He charged me $0.45 per fish instead of $0.40 per fish.  Then gave me 15% discount but not 25% discount.  Both the charges and discount were not right. My wife told the cashier about the problem and he told us the price he input was correct.  He didn't want to look at my wife and he looked unhappy on what we said from his behavior. Not sure if we are not caucasian. I told my wife to solve the problem later with the Manager. I found the manager and told her about the issue. She made the correction on the charges and gave me the refund. But I forgot to tell her this was not the first time I was charged for the wrong price. I will keep an eye on the receipts as I don't want to overpay if I shouldn't be. Nobody want to lose money on the high value items. Good Luck!

featured_reviews.review_id: Took our dog to be bathed and groomed.  The whole front area of the groom section was filled with dog hair cuttings in every shape and color - we checked in with the desk person and the groomer took our pup and we left. We came back 2 hours later to pick him up and the place was still a total mess - disgusting and stinky and there was only one person there and she was busy bathing another dog - I went to the front to ask for help and they had the groomer come out with our pup and she kept saying she was busy...the harness we were hoping they would have fitted our dog with was covered in long white dog hairs, our dog is a short hair black Doberman.  Our pup was clean but our experience was horrible and the place was not sanitary.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great service and always make my dog feel special. Staff always helpful friendly and obviously love animals.
featured_reviews.review_text: Great service and always make my dog feel special. Staff always helpful friendly and obviously love animals.
